We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private SchaffTrendCycle _stc;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_stc = STC(symbol, cyclePeriod, fastPeriod, slowPeriod);

// In OnData()
if (_stc.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "STC Current", _stc.Current);
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.stc = self.STC(symbol, cyclePeriod, fastPeriod, slowPeriod)

# In OnData()
if self.stc.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "STC Current", self.stc.Current);
